summary.span: 表示用於 控制項的應用程式功能表。

span.span: Represents an Application Menu that is used in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個功能區包含應用程式功能表功能區中的第一個索引標籤。Every ribbon includes an Application Menu as the first tab in the ribbon. 其他功能區索引標籤包含文件內容的控制項。Other ribbon tabs contain controls for working with the document content. 相反地，應用程式 功能表顯示檔案所使用的命令的功能表。In contrast, the Application Menu presents a menu of commands for working with the file. 範例包括傳統上移至建立、 開啟、 儲存和列印檔案的 [檔案] 功能表中的命令。Examples include commands that traditionally go in the File menu to create, open, save, and print files. 它也用來存取程式選項和 [結束] 命令。It is also used to access program options and the Exit command. 下圖顯示功能區控制項的應用程式功能表。The following illustration shows the Application Menu for a ribbon control. ![功能區應用程式功能表](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "功能區應用程式功能表")![Ribbon Application Menu](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "Ribbon Application Menu") 可以裝載和物件。The can host and objects. 應用程式功能表還包含*輔助窗格*和*頁尾窗格*，可以主控其他的內容。The Application Menu also has an *auxiliary pane* and a *footer pane* that can host additional content. 屬性主機和通常用來顯示最近的文件的清單。The property hosts a and is typically used to display a list of recent documents. 屬性通常裝載按鈕，可讓程式選項和 [結束] 命令的存取。The property typically hosts buttons that enable access to program options and the Exit command. 下列清單顯示在應用程式功能表中的一般元素的階層。The following list shows the typical hierarchy of elements in an Application Menu. - - - - - - - - ## Examples 下列範例會顯示應用程式功能表先前所示。The following example shows the Application Menu as illustrated previously. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#AppMenuFull](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/ribbonwindow1.xaml#appmenufull)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ AuxiliaryPaneContent { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式功能表輔助窗格的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the Application Menu auxiliary pane.

value.span: 應用程式功能表輔助窗格的內容。

span.span: The content of the Application Menu auxiliary pane.
The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks [應用程式] 功能表有*輔助窗格*，可以主控其他的內容。The Application Menu has an *auxiliary pane* that can host additional content. 屬性主機和通常用來顯示最近的文件的清單。The property hosts a and is typically used to display a list of recent documents. 下圖顯示功能區控制項的應用程式功能表。The following illustration shows the Application Menu for a ribbon control. 輔助窗格裝載最近的文件的清單。The auxiliary pane hosts a list of recent documents. ![功能區應用程式功能表](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "功能區應用程式功能表")![Ribbon Application Menu](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "Ribbon Application Menu") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例顯示先前顯示的應用程式功能表的輔助窗格內容。The following example shows the auxiliary pane content of the Application Menu shown previously. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#AppMenuAuxPane](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/ribbonwindow1.xaml#appmenuauxpane)]

The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來指定內容的視覺效果。You use the property to specify the visualization of the content. 如果您有多個範本定義，而且想要指定邏輯，選取要使用範本，然後使用這個屬性。If you have more than one template defined and want to specify logic that selects a template to use, then you use this property. 如果這個屬性就會忽略屬性設定。This property is ignored if the property is set. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks [應用程式] 功能表有*頁尾窗格*，可以主控其他的內容。The Application Menu has a *footer pane* that can host additional content. 屬性通常裝載按鈕，可讓程式選項和 [結束] 命令的存取。The property typically hosts buttons that enable access to program options and the Exit command. 下圖顯示功能區控制項的應用程式功能表。The following illustration shows the Application Menu for a ribbon control. 頁尾窗格主機**結束** 按鈕。The footer pane hosts an **Exit** button. ![功能區應用程式功能表](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "功能區應用程式功能表")![Ribbon Application Menu](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "Ribbon Application Menu") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例顯示頁尾 窗格的內容應用程式功能表先前所示。The following example shows the footer pane content of the Application Menu shown previously.

summary.span: 在套用新的範本時，建置 的視覺化樹狀結構。

span.span: Builds the visual tree for the when a new template is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序 (例如重建配置傳遞) 呼叫 方法時，就會叫用此方法。This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the method.

span.span: The container element.
The item that the container is for.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示是否要從 或 屬性將樣式套用至指定項目 (item) 的容器項目 (element)。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether to apply the style from the or property to the container element of the specified item.

returns.span: 如果 是 、 或 ，則為 ，否則為基底實作傳回的值。

span.span: if is a , , or ; otherwise, the value returned by the base implementation.
